mapper.insert: INSERT INTO academy (academyNum,academyName,totalCount, startDate,endDate,startTime,endTime ,lectureDay, price, roomNum, instNum, acProfileImage) VALUES (academy_seq.NEXTVAL, #{academyName},#{totalCount},#{startDate},#{endDate}, #{startTime},#{endTime},#{lectureDay},#{price},#{roomNum},#{instNum},#{acProfileImage})
mapper.select: SELECT academyNum, academyName,startDate,endDate,totalCount,a.roomNum,roomName,a.instNum,instName,startTime,endTime, price,lectureDay, acProfileImage FROM academy a JOIN roomInfo r ON a.roomNum=r.roomNum JOIN instructor i ON a.instNum=i.instNum WHERE academyNum=#{academyNum}
